In fact, you are simply losing

Sleep
Late in pregnancy it can 
be	very	difficult	to	get	a	
good nightâ€™s sleep. It can be 
uncomfortable lying down or, 
just when you get comfortable, 
you	find	that	you	have	to	get	
up to go to the toilet.
Some women have strange 
dreams or nightmares about 
the baby and about the birth. 
Talking about them can help 
you.
